channel.title: Labs on BIO 108 and 217
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on BIO 108 and 217

item.title: Apr 26 Lab
item.description: Plan The van is back (they claim), and the birds are at Hempstead Lake SP (hotspot - South End, illustrated histogram). Expected conditions As of Thursday morning, scattered thunderstorms are forecast for early Friday morning, though rain probability is <50% during lab time. We can manage that. If it rains hard, we will retreat. In a little drizzle, we can probably stay out. At Hempstead, we’re never very far from the van.

item.title: Apr 19 Lab
item.description: Plan We were heading to Valley Stream SP, but there wasn’t a van, so we walked around campus. Expected conditions nice Jobs I did the recording. eBird list On campus: https://ebird.org/view/checklist/S55131535
